title: UPDATE: Friday homicide victim identified; gunfire erupts at late night party in Danville
content:
To view this page ensure that Adobe Flash Player version 10.2.0 or greater is installed.
A 21-year-old Danville man was killed and two other teenagers injured in a shooting at a party Friday night in Danville.
Police responded to the 200 block of Kemper Road near the Danville Community College campus for a shots fired call at about 10:20 p.m., according to a news release.
Anyone with information about this incident is encouraged to contact Danville Crime Stoppers at (434) 793-0000, the Danville Police Department at (434) 799-6508 or at crimetips@danvilleva.gov.
